dialog-tuesday-broom.name: %Marta%
messages:
Hey, that broom is mine! How did that end
up there?

dialog-smith-prechoose.name: %Smith%
messages:
Don't look at me! I don't know how any of
this stuff works!

dialog-marta-prechoose.name: %Marta%
messages:
One of those artifacts seems a little
familiar to me....

dialog-marta-prechoose-broomd.name: %Marta%
messages: I knew I recognized this broom!

dialog-trekkie-prechoose.name: %Trekkie%
messages: Oh, me hope it's a good one!

dialog-shepherd-prechoose.name: %Shepherd%
messages: Is that old junk really magic?

dialog-cleo-prechoose.name: %Cleo%
messages:
Ooh! I bet it's gonna be the one on the
left! No, the right! No, the second one!

dialog-beatrice-prechoose.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
It's been so long since we've had a new
mage!

dialog-baker-prechoose.name: %Baker%
messages:
Um, I gotta get back to work, kid. You
wanna hurry it up a little?

dialog-alfonso-prechoose.name: %Alfonso%
messages:
The mage must present themselves to the
artifacts until one shows interest.

dialog-zippy-postchoose.name: %Aunt Zippy%
messages:
We always knew you were destined for great
things!

dialog-zappy-postchoose.name: %Uncle Zappy%
messages: We're both so proud of you!

dialog-smith-postchoose.name: %Smith%
messages: Sounds like that ring is a big deal.

dialog-max-postchoose.name: %Max Swagger%
messages:
Hmm. That ring looks a bit too plain to
be the real Ring Zero, doesn't it?

dialog-marta-postchoose.name: %Marta%
messages: Wow. Never seen a TUESDAY like this before!

dialog-beatrice-postchoose.name: %Beatrice%
messages:
Oh! I never thought I'd see this day! Oh,
my Delmar...!

dialog-tuesday1.name: %Jackob%
messages:
You have come of age, and what a joyous
day it is.

You may have noticed some aches and pains,
and hair growing in new places. It's also
possible --

dialog-tuesday2.name: %Alfonso%
messages:
Uh, that's the wrong speech! It's TUESDAY,
not puberty education!

dialog-tuesday4.name: %Alfonso%
messages:
No, not Tuesday, TUESDAY. You know,
Traditional and Unambiguous Event of
Selection Directly Affecting You.

dialog-tuesday6.name: %Alfonso%
messages:
Each mage, upon the day of their 16th
birthday, will then be present for their
TUESDAY.

Upon the chosen TUESDAY, each mage is
recognized by forces beyond our
comprehension as ready to wield power
bestowed upon them by a magical artifact.

Mages do not choose their own artifacts,
but rather are subject to the moods and
temperaments of the artifacts.

dialog-tuesday7.name: %Alfonso%
messages:
The mage must present themselves to the
artifacts until one shows interest. Mage,
step forth.

dialog-ring1.name: %Alfonso%
messages:
Well, this is certainly... unexpected.
We've never had a dud quite like this one
before.

dialog-ring3.name: %Alfonso%
messages: Oh! Oh, good heavens! Is that --

dialog-ring4.name: %PLAYER%
messages: It just slipped itself onto my finger!

dialog-ring5.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Um, it's not coming off. Is that normal?

dialog-ring6.name: %Alfonso%
messages: Nothing about that thing is normal!

dialog-ring6.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Is it bad?! What's wrong with it?
Am I... am I gonna die?!

dialog-ring6.name: %Jackob%
messages: The ring isn't bad, it's just... powerful.

dialog-ring6.name: %Bert%
messages: No one has been chosen by this ring before.

dialog-ring7.name: %Alfonso%
messages: Oh, but this is good news, isn't it?
This means we can finally fix things!

dialog-ring8.name: %Jackob%
messages: Yes, you can fix things at last!

dialog-ring9.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
But the town is all glitchy and hacked!
How am I supposed to fix it with this
thing? Unless....

dialog-ring10.name: %Alfonso%
messages: Yes, exactly! That ring, Ring Zero --

That ring gives you the power to hack the
planet!

dialog-ring10.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
Hack the planet? You mean... all the stuff
that's broken?

dialog-ring10.name: %Bert%
messages: You can fix what the Big Bad broke!

dialog-ring10.name: %Jackob%
messages:
Everything that the Big Bag hacked so
many years ago.... Everything that
scoundrel ruined....

dialog-ring10.name: %PLAYER%
messages: This ring gives me the Big Bad's power?

But I don't know how to hack! How am I
supposed to fix anything?

dialog-maybe-none.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Wait. Was that the last one?

dialog-tuesday-glasses.name: %PLAYER%
messages:
This is clearly a temporary asset that
hasn't been replaced with anything yet.

dialog-tuesday-book.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Ugh. Is that an eye on the cover?

And I don't wanna know what kind of
leather that is.
It's not reacting to me, though.

dialog-tuesday-wand3.name: %PLAYER%
messages: Erm, maybe I had that a bit wrong.

dialog-murmur3.name: %Baker%
messages:
I'm pretty sure %PLAYER% touched
all of them....
